title: The Las Vegas Sports Scene Is Booming!
itunes:title: The Las Vegas Sports Scene Is Booming!
description:
There is no doubt that Las Vegas is booming in the world of sports. With the success of the Golden Knights and Raiders relocation, the city looks forward to the possibility of hosting a Super Bowl. Jason Kelly, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch are joined by the Las Vegas Convention and Visitors Authority CEO Steve Hill. We discuss what’s next for the authority and how they plan to target an MLB and NBA franchise. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
